entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking dumbstruck but then reacting with excitement when he sees the owl.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as shouting for Hedwig and then hurrying after her. He also reads a piece of parchment that Hedwig brought.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is described as a snowy owl perched on the windowsill, flying inside, and landing on the table.

entities.name: moonlight
entities.description: Moonlight is mentioned as illuminating Hedwig on the windowsill.

relationships.description: Ron reacts excitedly when he sees Hedwig and the piece of parchment she brought.
Harry interacts with Hedwig by shouting for her, pulling open the window, and reading a piece of parchment that she brought.
Harry communicates with Ron by saying 'About time!' when he sees the piece of parchment Hedwig brought.
